sourcesContent: import { Dialog , Box, Typography, List, ListItem,} from '@mui/material'; import { qrCodeImage } from '../../constants/data'; const dialogStyle = { height: '96%', marginTop: '12%', width:'60%', maxWidth: '100%', boxShadow: 'none', overflow: 'none' } const LoginDialog = () => { return( To Use Whatsapp on your computer 1. Open Whatsapp on your phone 2. Tap Menu settings and select Whatsapp Web 3. Point your phone on this screen to capture the code ) } export default LoginDialog;
